config.mod_enable.name: Enable Mod
config.mod_enable.tooltip: Toggle whether the mod affects tree rendering.
config.mod_enable_toggle_key.name: Mod Enable Toggle Key
config.mod_enable_toggle_key.tooltip: Shortcut key to toggle whether the mod is enabled.
config.texture_change.name: Replace Texture
config.texture_change.tooltip: Check to replace the texture of the selected trees below
config.texture_change_toggle_key.name: Texture Replacement Shortcut Key
config.texture_change_toggle_key.tooltip: Shortcut key to quickly control whether to replace the texture
config.minish_tree.name: Minimize Trees
config.minish_tree.tooltip: Check to minimize the selected trees below by half
config.minish_tree_toggle_key.name: Minimize Tree Shortcut Key
config.minish_tree_toggle_key.tooltip: Shortcut key to quickly control whether to minimize the tree
config.highlight_tree_seed.name: Highlight Tree Seeds
config.highlight_tree_seed.tooltip: Check to mark the position of tree seeds with a flashing highlight box
config.highlight_tree_seed_toggle_key.to: Shortcut key to quickly control whether to highlight tree seeds
config.not_highlight_tree_seed_by_fertil: Cancel highlighting for fertilized tree seeds
Checking this will cancel the highlight box rendering for fertilized tree seeds
config.transparent_tree.name: Should the tree obstructing the tree seeds be transparent
config.transparent_tree.tooltip: When checked, the tree obstructing the highlighted tree seeds will become transparent
config.show_tree_seed_tips.name: Show Tree Seed Tips
config.show_tree_seed_tips.tooltip: Check to add a tip to the tree when there are tree seeds
config.show_tree_seed_tips_toggle_key.to: Shortcut key to control whether to show tree seed tips
config.show_tree_moss_tips.name: Show Moss Tips
config.show_tree_moss_tips.tooltip: Check to add a tip to the tree when there is moss
config.show_tree_moss_tips_toggle_key.to: Shortcut key to control whether to show moss tips
config.highlight_tree_seed_color.name: Tree seed highlight box color
config.highlight_tree_seed_color.tooltip: You can set the color of the highlight box used to mark tree seeds
config.highlight_sapling.name: Highlight saplings
config.highlight_sapling.tooltip: When checked, saplings of size one will be highlighted
config.highlight_sapling_color.name: Sapling highlight box color
config.highlight_sapling_color.tooltip: You can set the color of the highlight box used to mark saplings
config.hide_tapper_product.name: Hide Tapper Product
config.hide_tapper_product.tooltip: Check to hide the product of the tapper, but don't worry, you can still get it
config.render_tree_trunk.name: Render Tree Trunk
config.render_tree_trunk.tooltip: Uncheck to render a mature tree as a stump
config.render_tree_trunk_toggle_key.name: Render Tree Trunk Shortcut Key
config.render_tree_trunk_toggle_key.tool: Shortcut key to quickly control whether to render the tree trunk
config.render_leafy_shadow.name: Render Leafy Shadow
config.render_leafy_shadow.tooltip: Uncheck to stop rendering leaf shadows when not rendering the tree trunk
config.render_leafy_shadow_toggle_key.to: Shortcut key to quickly control whether to render leaf shadows
config.change_oak.name: Apply to <Oak>
config.change_oak.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Oak>
config.change_maple.name: Apply to <Maple>
config.change_maple.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Maple>
config.change_pine.name: Apply to <Pine>
config.change_pine.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Pine>
config.change_mushroom.name: Apply to <Mushroom>
config.change_mushroom.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Mushroom>
config.change_mahogany.name: Apply to <Mahogany>
config.change_mahogany.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Mahogany>
config.change_green_rain_type1.name: Apply to <Moss Tree 1>
config.change_green_rain_type1.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Moss Tree 1>
config.change_green_rain_type2.name: Apply to <Moss Tree 2>
config.change_green_rain_type2.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Moss Tree 2>
config.change_green_rain_type3.name: Apply to <Fern Tree>
config.change_green_rain_type3.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Fern Tree>
config.change_mystic.name: Apply to <Mystic Tree>
config.change_mystic.tooltip: Check to apply the above settings to <Mystic Tree>
